<small>Aramaic form: [[H8065]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַי‎</span>]**noun masculine**<sup>[[Deut.33.28|Deut 33:28]]</sup> only plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַ֫יִם‎</span><sub>421</sub> ([[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§324 a</sup>) ==heavens, sky== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šamû***</u></abbr> plural <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šamê, šamûtu***</u></abbr>, also <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šamâmu***</u></abbr>, compare Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שמם‎</span>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סמה‎</span> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 46, 124</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁמַיָּא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Palmyrene, Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שמ(י)ן‎</span> in proper name (compounded with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בעל‎</span>) [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>153</sup> [[BDB#Cooke|GACooke]]<sup>45</sup>; on plural form see [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xiii (1888), 341 f.</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.1.1|Gen 1:1]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָ֑יִם‎</span>- [[Gen.2.4|Gen 2:4]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁמַ֫יְמָה‎</span> [[Exod.9.8|Exod 9:8]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵי‎</span> [[Deut.10.14|Deut 10:14]] + 9 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.8.4|Ps 8:4]] +2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמָיו‎</span> [[Deut.33.28|Deut 33:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Lev.26.19|Lev 26:19]], with verb plural, [[Hos.2.23|Hos 2:23]] — 

**1. a.** ***visible heavens, sky***, where stars, etc., are [[Judg.5.20|Judg 5:20]]; [[Gen.15.5|Gen 15:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.4.19|Deut 4:19]]; [[Gen.1.14|Gen 1:14]]; [[Gen.1.15|Gen 1:15]]; [[Gen.1.17|Gen 1:17]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), hence <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוֺכְבֵי הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Gen.22.17|Gen 22:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) = 9 t. (usually as countless), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(כָּלֿ) צְבָא הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Deut.4.19|Deut 4:19]]; [[Jer.8.2|Jer 8:2]] + ( <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> **1 c**; ==rarely of angels==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> **1 b**; ==before which fowl fly== [[Gen.1.20|Gen 1:20]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[Deut.4.17|Deut 4:17]]; [[Jer.8.7|Jer 8:7]]; [[Prov.30.19|Prov 30:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺף הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Gen.2.19|Gen 2:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.1.19|Gen 1:19]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) + (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺף‎</span> **1**), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִפֹּר שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.8.9|Ps 8:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁרֵי שׁ‎</span> [[Lam.4.19|Lam 4:19]] as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָקִיע‎</span> (q. v.) [[Gen.1.8|Gen 1:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ps.19.2|Ps 19:2]], with waters beneath and above [[Gen.1.9|Gen 1:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]], compare v[[Gen.1.7|Gen 1:7]]), [[Ps.148.4|Ps 148:4]], darkened with clouds [[1Kgs.18.45|1Kgs 18:45]], cleared by wind [[Job.26.13|Job 26:13]] whence comes rain [[Gen.8.2|Gen 8:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]]; [[Deut.11.11|Deut 11:11]] +, and dew [[Gen.27.28|Gen 27:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), v[[Gen.27.39|Gen 27:39]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.33.28|Deut 33:28]] (poem) +. compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּרְכֹת שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.49.25|Gen 49:25]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶגֶר שׁ‎</span> [[Deut.33.13|Deut 33:13]] (poem), but also (destructive) fire [[2Kgs.1.10|2Kgs 1:10]] (twice in verse); [[Job.1.16|Job 1:16]] + (see also **2 a** below); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֹבְרֵישׁ‎</span> [[Isa.47.13|Isa 47:13]], i.e. astrologers, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺתוֺתהַשּׁ‎</span> [[Jer.10.2|Jer 10:2]] as high [[Gen.11.4|Gen 11:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), Amos (:2 (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאוֺל‎</span>), v[[Gen.11.6|Gen 11:6]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span>) +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדלֵֿב הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Deut.4.11|Deut 4:11]]as over all the earth, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת (כָּלֿ)הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Gen.6.17|Gen 6:17]]; [[Gen.7.19|Gen 7:19]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.2.25|Deut 2:25]]; [[Eccl.1.13|Eccl 1:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת וגו‎</span> (of extermination) [[Exod.17.14|Exod 17:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.7.24|Deut 7:24]]; [[Deut.9.14|Deut 9:14]] +; specifically of Israel, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמֶיךָ‎</span> [[Deut.28.23|Deut 28:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Lev.26.19|Lev 26:19]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבֵין הָאָרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין הַשּׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.18.9|2Sam 18:9]] (hung from tree), [[1Chr.21.16|1Chr 21:16]] (of angel), compare [[Ezek.8.3|Ezek 8:3]] (Ezekiel in vision), [[Zech.5.9|Zech 5:9]] (flying ephah); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַדקְֿצֵה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקְּצֵה הַשּׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> of limits of horizon [[Deut.4.32|Deut 4:32]], compare [[Deut.30.4|Deut 30:4]]; [[Neh.1.9|Neh 1:9]]; [[Ps.19.7|Ps 19:7]] as made by God [[Jer.51.15|Jer 51:15]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּבֵל‎</span>), [[Ps.8.4|Ps 8:4]] + enduring [[Deut.11.21|Deut 11:21]]; [[Job.14.12|Job 14:12]]; [[Ps.89.30|Ps 89:30]] especially<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְ(הָ)אָרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הַ)שּׁ‎</span> = universe (compare in Sabean, [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>No.41.42, l.3</sup>) [[Deut.3.24|Deut 3:24]]; [[Gen.1.1|Gen 1:1]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) + (especially Deuteronomy, [[BDB#Isa|Isa]]<sup>2</sup>, Psalms), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָם‎</span> [[Exod.20.11|Exod 20:11]]; [[Hag.2.6|Hag 2:6]], etc., + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם מִתַּחַת לָאָרֶץ‎</span> [[Exod.20.4|Exod 20:4]]= [[Deut.5.8|Deut 5:8]],.compare [[Prov.30.4|Prov 30:4]], etc.; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהוֺם‎</span> [[Prov.8.27|Prov 8:27]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span> v[[Prov.8.29|Prov 8:29]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲרָשִׁים וְהָאָרֶץ חֲרָשָׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> as part of future glory [[Isa.65.17|Isa 65:17]]; [[Isa.66.22|Isa 66:22]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** phrases are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרֻבּוֺת הַשּׁ‎</span> (letting rain through) [[Gen.7.11|Gen 7:11]]; [[Gen.8.2|Gen 8:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Mal.3.10|Mal 3:10]] (figurative), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּשּׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲיַעֲשֶׂה י‎</span> [[2Kgs.7.2|2Kgs 7:2]]; [[2Kgs.7.19|2Kgs 7:19]], so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּלְתֵי שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.78.23|Ps 78:23]] (for manna), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְָּגַן שׁ‎</span>, v[[Ps.78.24|Ps 78:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.105.40|Ps 105:40]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺסְדוֺת הַשּׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.22.8|2Sam 22:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאָרֶץ‎</span>; in \|\| [[Ps.18.8|Ps 18:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַמּוּרֵי שׁ‎</span> [[Job.26.11|Job 26:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּג שׁ‎</span> [[Job.22.14|Job 22:14]] ***towards the sky*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁמַ֫יְמָה‎</span> [[Josh.8.20|Josh 8:20]]([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.9.8|Exod 9:8]]; [[Exod.9.10|Exod 9:10]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Job.2.12|Job 2:12]]; [[Judg.13.20|Judg 13:20]]; [[Judg.20.40|Judg 20:40]]; [[2Chr.6.13|2Chr 6:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿשָּׁמַיִם‎</span> [[Exod.9.22|Exod 9:22]]; [[Exod.9.23|Exod 9:23]]; [[Exod.10.21|Exod 10:21]]; [[Exod.10.22|Exod 10:22]](all [[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלשֿׁ‎</span> [[Deut.32.40|Deut 32:40]] (poem), [[Dan.12.7|Dan 12:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> alone [[1Kgs.8.22|1Kgs 8:22]]; [[1Kgs.8.54|1Kgs 8:54]]; [[Job.35.5|Job 35:5]]; [[Prov.23.5|Prov 23:5]]. 

**2. a.** ==as abode of God== (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[1Kgs.8.30|1Kgs 8:30]]; [[1Kgs.8.32|1Kgs 8:32]] + often, where he sits enthroned [[Ps.2.3|Ps 2:3]]; [[Isa.66.1|Isa 66:1]], etc., compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכֵבשׁ‎</span> [[Deut.33.26|Deut 33:26]](poem), [[Ps.68.34|Ps 68:34]], whence he rains brimstone [[Gen.19.24|Gen 19:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), bread [[Exod.16.4|Exod 16:4]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), compare [[Neh.9.15|Neh 9:15]], casts hailstones [[Josh.11.11|Josh 11:11]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), talks with Israel [[Exod.20.22|Exod 20:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] v[[Exod.20.19|Exod 20:19]]) +, compare [[Gen.21.17|Gen 21:17]]; [[Gen.22.11|Gen 22:11]]; [[Gen.22.15|Gen 22:15]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), looks down [[Deut.26.15|Deut 26:15]] +, hears his people [[Ps.20.7|Ps 20:7]]+ 10 t. Chronicles, etc.; he thunders <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּשּׁ‎</span> [[1Sam.2.10|1Sam 2:10]]; [[Ps.18.14|Ps 18:14]],\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןשֿׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.22.14|2Sam 22:14]] he bends (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נטה‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> to come down v[[2Sam.22.10|2Sam 22:10]]= [[Ps.18.10|Ps 18:10]], compare [[Ps.144.5|Ps 144:5]] and (***rend***) [[Isa.63.19|Isa 63:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְּתְּחוּ הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.1.1|Ezek 1:1]] in vision of God, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Gen.28.17|Gen 28:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֹהִים‎</span>); though even <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵי הַשּׁ‎</span> ***the highest heuvens*** cannot hold him [[Deut.10.14|Deut 10:14]]; [[1Kgs.8.27|1Kgs 8:27]] 2 Chron 6:18, [[2Chr.2.5|2Chr 2:5]]; [[Neh.9.6|Neh 9:6]]; [[Ps.148.4|Ps 148:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵי שְׁמֵיקֶֿדֶם‎</span> [[Ps.68.34|Ps 68:34]] he is called <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֹהֵי הַשּׁ‎</span> (post-exilic title) [[Ezra.1.2|Ezra 1:2]] = [[2Chr.36.23|2Chr 36:23]] + 11 t. Ezra Nehemiah; [[Jonah.1.9|Jonah 1:9]] (compare Aramaic, [[Dan.2.18|Dan 2:18]]; [[Dan.2.19|Dan 2:19]]; [[Dan.2.37|Dan 2:37]]; [[Dan.2.44|Dan 2:44]] in [[Gen.24.7|Gen 24:7]] add with [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֵאלֹהֵי הָאָרֶץ‎</span>, as v[[Gen.24.3|Gen 24:3]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלהַֿשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.136.26|Ps 136:26]] his sword is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.34.5|Isa 34:5]], but also his <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶסֶד‎</span> [[Ps.36.6|Ps 36:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶדֶק‎</span> [[Ps.85.12|Ps 85:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱמוּנָח‎</span> [[Ps.89.3|Ps 89:3]], his word fixed [[Ps.119.89|Ps 119:89]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> are <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמָיו‎</span> (of Israel) [[Deut.33.28|Deut 33:28]] (poem), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Lev.26.19|Lev 26:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.8.4|Ps 8:4]]; [[Ps.144.5|Ps 144:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵי י‎</span> [[Lam.3.66|Lam 3:66]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדְשׁוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.20.7|Ps 20:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** Elijah taken up <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> in whirlwind [[2Kgs.2.1|2Kgs 2:1]], compare v[[2Kgs.2.11|2Kgs 2:11]]. 

**3.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> personified in various relations [[Isa.1.2|Isa 1:2]]; [[Jer.2.12|Jer 2:12]]; [[Job.15.15|Job 15:15]]; [[Ps.19.2|Ps 19:2]]; [[Ps.50.6|Ps 50:6]] = [[Ps.97.6|Ps 97:6]]; [[Ps.89.6|Ps 89:6]]; [[Ps.148.4|Ps 148:4]]. 

**4.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֶכֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> p. 573. 

I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁמָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמם‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂ֫מָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span>.
